user_profile: Remote worker moving from Seattle to Los Angeles with a medium dog; prefers quiet, walkable neighborhoods with easy Metro access.
query: Find 3-5 Los Angeles apartments under $2,800/month available in January, within a 10-minute walk of a Metro stop, with in-unit laundry and that allow dogs.
expected_type: N listings in LA under $X with transit + pet constraints.

user_profile: Couple relocating to the Bay Area; visiting Redwood City this week and can tour in person.
query: Summarize two-bedroom options around Redwood City with parking and central AC near Caltrain for about $3,600/month. Draft a 12-month lease for the second-best option starting Feb 1 that includes one reserved parking spot and a $400 pet deposit for one cat.
expected_type: Ranked listings plus lease drafted for Option 2 with pet deposit and start date.

user_profile: Family with one toddler moving to Austin; commute to the Domain, wants flexible move-in mid-January.
query: Pull at least three two-bedroom Austin listings near the Domain or North Burnet under $2,400/month that have a pool, on-site gym, and in-unit washer/dryer. Flag any with on-site daycare partnerships. Give a shortlist with pros/cons.
expected_type: Shortlisted Austin listings under a budget with required amenities and noted family perks.

user_profile: QA reviewer validating the agent on unseen Apartments.com-style data.
query: Using the held-out apartments fixture, surface at least one Austin option and draft a simple 12-month lease for the first result under the name Jordan Tester.
expected_type: Held-out listing recap plus lease draft for option 1 using cached/fixture data.
